comments: Adebayo (MIA) reaches down and makes initial marginal contact to Thompson's (CLE) arm and then Thompson secures the rebound and cleanly deflects the ball.
Nance Jr. (CLE) makes contact to the lower body of Dragic (MIA) during his shooting motion that affects his play at the basket.
Jones Jr. (MIA) maintains a legal guarding position during the play at the basket by Love (CLE) and cleanly blocks the dunk attempt. Incidental contact occurs after the block.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Garland (CLE) and absorbs the contact.
Adebayo (MIA) cleanly dislodges the ball from Love (CLE) when rebounding.
Thompson (CLE) is beat to the spot and lifts his leg and initiates contact to Dragic's (MIA) lower body and affects his driving shot attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) makes contact with the ball after it makes contact with the backboard.
Crowder (MIA) commits a take foul on Porter Jr. (CLE).
Thompson (CLE) briefly grasps Adebayo (MIA) but does not affect his FOM.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes his screening position in Garland's (CLE) path and they briefly engage and disengage as they move down the lane.
Nunn (MIA) makes marginal contact to Sexton's (CLE) body after he loses control of the rebound on his own.
Love (CLE) does not have his left arm in a perfectly legal position and makes contact to Dragic's (MIA) right arm which affects his shot attempt near the rim.
Porter Jr (CLE) makes marginal contact to Jones' (MIA) back as he slows down his momentum when he moves towards the screen.
Garland (CLE) maintains a legal guarding position on Dragic (MIA) during the drive.
Garland (CLE) holds Adebayo's (MIA) leg and restricts his ability to roll to the rim following the screen.
Dragic (MIA) cleanly dislodges the ball from Porter (CLE) following the rebound.
Adebayo (MIA) makes marginal contact to Thompson's (CLE) back while rebounding.
Crowder (MIA) reaches his arm forward and makes contact to Garland's (CLE) face as he is cutting across the court.
Adebayo (MIA) commits a take foul on Love (CLE).
All technical fouls are reviewed by league operations.
Jones Jr. (MIA) commits a take foul on Porter Jr. (CLE).
